Description: Rim sherd of Attic pottery lip-cup; interior glazed black; exterior reserved with narrow black band below offset of lip; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The sherd belongs to the same vase as British Museum 1888,0601.250.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 23.1.34)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0567) (Phase 1)
